resources.string: Welcome! Our app will help you plan your trips and keep track of your usual travel routes.
Set up your usual routes to be notified about possible delays.
Keep track of your usual travel routes here
Check the local bus or train schedule or find available parking in the city
Check if the bus or train is on time
Check the timetable of Trento urban buses
Check the timetable of Rovereto urban buses
Check the timetable of suburban buses
Check the timetable of local trains
Check the availability of parking slots in the Trento city parkings
Check the availability of parking slots in the Rovereto city parkings
Learn about the municipality decrees about mobility
